function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Property owners using eviction as rent collection tool","Impact":"Increase in housing insecurity, displacement, and potential exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regulation and enforcement of fair eviction laws, financial support for property owners and tenants","Technologies":"Housing management software, legal aid databases","People":"Tenants, property owners, public health","Owner":"Government, housing authorities, legal organizations"},{"Description":"Evictions for small amounts of money","Impact":"Increased risk of turnover, housing instability, and potential exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Financial assistance for tenants, mediation services, education on tenant rights","Technologies":"Financial assistance platforms, legal aid apps","People":"Tenants, property owners, public health","Owner":"Nonprofit organizations, government, housing authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of legal protections and support for tenants","Impact":"Vulnerability to displacement, decrease in access to healthcare, and potential exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Legal aid services, tenant education, advocacy for tenant rights","Technologies":"Legal aid databases, tenant rights apps","People":"Tenants, property owners, public health","Owner":"Legal organizations, government, housing authorities"}]}
